mutants.code:
import re

def sort_string(string):
    words = string.split()
    words = list(set(words))
    words = [word for word in words if re.match('^[a-zA-Z]+$', word)]
    words.sort(key=len, reverse=False)
    return ' '.join(words)

import re

def sort_string(string):
    words = string.split()
    words = list(set(words))
    words = [word for word in words if re.match('^[a-zA-Z]+$', word)]
    words.sort(key=len, reverse=True)
    return ''.join(words)

mutants.original_line: words = [word for word in words if re.match(r'^[a-zA-Z]+$', word)]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if re.match('', word)]
mutants.code:
import re

def sort_string(string):
    words = string.split()
    words = list(set(words))
    words = [word for word in words if re.match('', word)]
    words.sort(key=len, reverse=True)
    return ' '.join(words)
